item.title: Gum Cover Letter
item.description: BRIBING PEOPLE WITH GUM FOR A JOB I seem to always be in need of a job. To make my application stand out I decided to run an experiment where I offered a stick of gum just for reading my resume. The experiment failed miserably. Here’s a youtube video of me reading the letter: And here’s the cover letter in full. SUBECT A STICK OF GUM FOR YOU, NO QUESTIONS ASKED
